Team4450.Lib

Class JoyStick

  • java.lang.Object
    • Team4450.Lib.JoyStick

  • public class JoyStick
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides an interface to the Joystick buttons. It monitors the state of the JS buttons and raises events when button state changes. Also provides stick axis information with dead zone applied.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JoyStick.JoyStickButton
      Button object which contains button id and current and latched state values of the button when contained in an event and if you directly request button state.
      static class  JoyStick.JoyStickButtonIDs
      JoyStick button id enumeration.
      class  JoyStick.JoyStickEvent
      Event description class returned to event handlers.
      static interface  JoyStick.JoyStickEventListener
      Java Interface definition for event listener.

        Returns:

      • GetCurrentState

        public boolean GetCurrentState(JoyStick.JoyStickButtonIDs requestedbutton)
        Get the current state of a registered button.
        Parameters:
        requestedbutton - Button id to check.
        Returns:
        True if pressed, false if not.

      • GetLatchedState

        public boolean GetLatchedState(JoyStick.JoyStickButtonIDs requestedbutton)
        Gets the latched state of a registered button. When buttons are pressed, the latch state is toggled and retained. Latched is in effect a presistent button press. Press and it latches, press again and it unlatches.
        Parameters:
        requestedbutton - Button id to check.
        Returns:
        True if button latched, false if not.

      • addJoyStickEventListener

        public void addJoyStickEventListener(JoyStick.JoyStickEventListener listener)
        Register a JoyStickEventListener object to receive events.
        Parameters:
        listener - JoyStickEventListener object to receive events.

      • removeJoyStickEventListener

        public void removeJoyStickEventListener(JoyStick.JoyStickEventListener listener)
        Remove the specified JoyStickEventListener object from event notification.
        Parameters:
        listener - JoyStickEventListener object to remove.
